tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensitive_trading_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    trading_data TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_trading_data (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(255),
    trade_amount DECIMAL,
    trader_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_trading_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trader_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(id),
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE traders (
  trader_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trader_email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  trader_password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

CREATE TABLE access_levels (
  level_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  level_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  level_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
  control_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  level_id INT REFERENCES access_levels(level_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  trader_id INT REFERENCES traders(trader_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
